headline: Are Las Vegas Sands’ (LVS) Asian Resorts and Buybacks Quietly Recasting Its Long-Term Story?
summary: Las Vegas Sands has recently been the focus of analyst attention after its past fiscal fourth-quarter 2025 earnings release, where expectations centered on diluted earnings of US$0.78 per share, helped by strong performances at The Londoner Macao and Marina Bay Sands in Singapore. An interesting angle is how this earnings momentum aligns with analyst views on the company’s longer-term revenue growth in Asia and the impact of its share repurchase program. Next, we’ll examine how...
